website_summaries.verdict: The Fosmon’s extra-long battery life, simple trackpad controls, backlit keyboard, and wide compatibility options more than make up for the fact that it’s only available in neon orange.
pros: Compact QWERTY keyboard with built-in touchpad
10 days of continuous use per battery charge
Expansive compatibility with Windows, Mac, smart TVs, smartphones, etc
cons: Since this little touchpad works well with all electronics, it’s no wonder that it is one of the pricier models available
